condition.narrative: Institutional Arrangements. By no later than one (1) month after the Effective Date, the Borrower shall establish, and thereaftermaintain, during Project implementation a full core implementation team with composition, functions and qualified staff in numbersand with experience and terms of reference satisfactory to the Bank.

Project Implementation Manual. The Recipient shall by no later than one (1) month after the Effective Date, prepare and adopt aProject implementation manual containing detailed guidelines and procedures for the implementation of the Project, including withrespect to: administration and coordination, monitoring and evaluation, financial management, procurement and accountingprocedures, environmental and social safeguards, corruption and fraud mitigation measures, a grievance redress mechanism, personaldata collection and processing in accordance with good international practice, roles and responsibilities for Projectimplementation, and such other arrangements and procedures as shall be required for the effective implementation of the Project, inform and substance satisfactory to the Association.

title.narrative: Percentage of suspected cases reported that are tested according to national guidelines
Percentage of confirmed COVID-19 cases managed as per national protocol
Complaints to the GRM satisfactorily addressed within 15 weeks of initial complaint being recorded
Proportion of open border control sites with trained teams and the necessary means of control, isolation and transport to isolationand care sites
M&E system established to monitor the COVID-19 preparedness and response plan
Country is maintaining an up to date referral system to care for COVID-19 patients
Number of public hospitals with COVID-19 triage capacity
Number of individuals reached with tailored information
Number of health staff trained in COVID-19 infection prevention and control per MOH-approved protocols
Number of RHMs provided with hand-washing supplies to prevent COVID-19
Number of hospitals with fully equipped ICU beds
Number of laboratory staff trained to conduct COVID-19 diagnosis
Number of COVID-19 tests conducted by the designated in-country laboratory (disaggregated by results)
